message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.SI

This paper discusses the problem of unintended biases in classifiers and proposes a framework for regularizing classifiers towards different fairness metrics. This topic is closely related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the social consequences of deploying machine learned models, which falls under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY). The use of statistical dependency tests is a common technique in cryptography (cs.CR) and the analysis of large-scale systems is relevant to systems and control (cs.SI).
